ygData.msgSnippet: hi, but I m not sure if I can play I m 10 years old my sad I can play. He and my brother play. brother charter is A Claric and  my dad I don t know what he is
ygData.messageBody:
hi, but I'm not sure if I can play I'm 10 years old my
sad I can play. He and my brother play. brother
charter is A Claric and my dad I don't know what he
is but his name is Ninlan. But I have played D$D I've
been a plandian, Druid, Claric And now I'm a Ranger
thats a Yan-ti That can turn into a giant Viper. So
e-mail me if think I shold still play.

P.S E-mail me





--- "STG2(SW) Pierce" <piercer@...> wrote:
> A Bard was one of my first classes I played and they
> are great for exploring
> places due to their speed song. At high levels they
> can pretty much fill
> the role of just about any class. I suggest putting
> all your songs in the
> number row since you'll be 'twisting' quite a few
> songs..upto 4 if your good
> enough. Happy Hunting!
>
> Dabruiser Troll
> Warrior of the 29th Season
